Review Text:
Definitely yummy tasting and unique stuff.
But one thing I really want the owners to look into is hygiene. I loved to order from here but once had been to the place physically and witnessed the store in the middle of their own garbage, I can't bring myself to get that picture out of my head.
A humble suggestion, you are doing great with the idea and flavours, why not do it right by also caring about the hygiene. It's a responsibility that comes with food. You can do wonders.
Their menu deserves 5*, but rating them as a business.

A unique concept of creating mocktails using coconut water and fruits.
The sugar content can be a bit less. Quantity is good for the price.
Must try : Coconut Juice, Coconut Pomegranate mocktail
Ordered 2 x coconut watermelon juices but got only one... All coconut based Juices are very tasty though... Coconut juice (coconut water + coconut malai) is the best!
Awesome taste, juices are thick, low sugary, fresh fruits juice..coconut water with malai is just yummyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy

I've ordered coconut juice from here, much to my disappointment it's so diluted and tasted blanc this time. Visited this place personally earlier, loved the coconut juice and expected it to be the same. I hope they would retain their original standards until next time. However, thank you for the service.

Coconut Juice!!! one thing you so need today ! had it for the first time when this place was just another van out there in the street.. these guys are doing an amazing job to cool you off in this scorching heat in Hyderabad! this one at Gachibowli has the right recipe üëç

I ordered the coconut juice from this place and personally it's the best thing you could have in this steamy summer.
It is tender coconut water blended with fresh coconut Malai and for all those coconut lovers out there, here's what you are looking for !!! It is served chilled and trust me it's a gulp of satisfaction when you take a sip. The packaging is leak proof and for 99 rupees the drink is completely Worthy till the last drop of it.
I would say a nice idea of experimenting coconut water and milk with many fruits etc. But I think they can cut down a little in their sugar quantity.

We have ordered three glass of coconut juice without sugar. But the juices delivered were filled with lots of sugar and it completely changed the real taste of coconut. It just makes it too sweet which overpowers the true taste. I would recommend the team to have a look at the instructions before sending item for delivery

Coco banana was good. The taste of banana was subtle. The taste was well kept to balance both coconut water and banana. As the fruit is ice blended you can see the icy formation on top. A recommend one. Coconut juice tasted like m a mixture of coconut water and grinded coconut. It was sweet in taste. Very happy with quantity.
The coconut watermelon was just amazing, totally refreshing. While the pineapple one had a little bit of concentrate kinda taste, but watermelon was just amazing.

Ultimate blending technique with coconut water....
Coconut special juice is awesome contains pure coconut malai chunks and coconut water...
Also... Try coco orange and kiwi mocktails ...
Coco pomegranate mocktail has a blend of coco chunks and mint.... Awesome combo....
Berry blast is a must try...
Amazing. Keep rocking !
Best coconut juice i ever had in my life.. Just fell in loveüòç I will order again. Coconut with malai.. Wat a combination.. Hats off to the chef

This place has amazing concoctions. The coconut juice that they make is amazingly refreshing! It would be great if they offered the 300ml glass of coconut juice through delivery and not just the 500ml one.

The idea of using coconut as the base of all their items may sound strange, but it is well worth a try. Coconut juice is a must try item.
NB: coconut juice can be addictive. Try at your own risk.
This place is highly recommended. Their coconut juice ( blended with tender coconut) is a must try. Other items (mint coconut juice and watermelon coconut juice) are also worth trying.

The dry summers of Hyderabad demands hydration. I ordered coconut milk shake 500 ml and watermelon with coconut milk and pomegranate with coconut milk.
I loved all the three juices.
Too refreshing.
But it would be really great if they can writr over the content.
As it is ample sweet. I was in doubt if they have added sugar or if the coconut itself is this sweet.
Over all great experience.
Would order again.
One of the best juices u get with unique flavours..For the first time I tasted the coconut water mixed with the flavours which u like .My personal favourite is coconut with pomo and dates.
Pretty neat and hygienic, they gave us the idea that so much can be done with coconut water, which was just a plain summer drink for us. I loved the kiwi and coconut drink the most.

I drank coco watermelon here it's sweet mixed with coconut and watermelon in a perfect mixture it's like heaven which is costing around 50rs.My sister drank coconut juice which is costing around 50rs perfect mixture of sugar and coconut and it's yum.I drank near gachibowli still the hotel is getting renuvated and some construction work is going on their at present.So I suggest you people to drink this coconut drinks in the other branch.
Ambience is not at all good at present and may be it will be good in the future.
Drinks:5/5
cost is affordable.As the hotel is getting ready I have not taken any pics.but a must try coconut juice center.

What can I say about this little corner we've found. If you drink coconut juice mixed with Malai here and do not go crazy then are you even human!
They make the best coconut juices that could ever have existed. It helps your tummy too.
Highly recommended! ü§ü

What and where ?
Coco Mint & Coco Orange Coolers from Coconut Juice Bar
What it got for me ?
Coco Mint is just a perfect soothing one with right blend of coconut water n mint while Coco Orange tasted more like mix fruit juice.
And price ?
Rs. 99 each !!!
.
.
.
Keep following @mrsfoodieglobetrotter for more !atoneplaceonline.com

I had ordered the most popular item from their menu, the coconut juice. I love tender coconuts. But didn't know that the blend of tender coconut water and the copra(malai) can be this amazing! This drink is very tasty, refreshing and energizing. The freshness of the coconut is worth all the money.
The packaging was pretty good and 500ml for a juice is quite a lot.
Wrote about not adding sugar in additional instructions but the restaurant didn‚Äôt seem to pay any attention to it. Not once but it happened twice. Very disappointing.

You can easily spot this place huddled closely with other eateries, just opposite to DLF gate. Tried their coconut juice which is a blend of tender coconut flesh with coconut water. Extremely soothing I must say. Definitely going back for more!!
I thought it's pure cocount juice but never expected that they add sugar in coconut juice. Really waste of ordering from coconut juice bar..

Coconut Juice! Yeah, it exists.
I love drinking coconut juice and when ever I see Coconut Juice on a menu there is a twinkle in my eyes.
ü••Coconut Juice Bar has many juices made with coconut water as it's base. Nothing excites me like coconut juice and I jumped in to order one.
üçπFresh coconut water blended with tender coconut malai makes it a healthy and tasty refreshment to have. The white texture of this resembles Toddy. Delivered quantity (500ml) was a lot for a person and there was no size customisation.
üç∂Who doesn't like to get coconut water delivered at the door step? Fresh 500ml coconut water was good.
PS: I love coconut juice üòç.

I love this Juice bar and a frequent customer to this juice bar for Coconut Juice. This time I didnt like the taste, I can feel some burnt food smell and taste. Request the shop owners to take proper care while preparing.
Good delivery and punctual
VERY GOOD

Coconut Juice - It‚Äôs really amazing. Must try for all the Coconut lovers.
You get juices from all flavours with coconut, prices are also reasonable.
A unique combination of coconut and cream makes the coconut juice a must try here...their are other various combinations of flavours along with coconut as well...I liked it :)
Good one juice like coconut with mixture of dates and well packed. Really enjoyed the taste of it and enjoyed with friends. Will get back soon.
Coco date smoothie was amazing. Definitely one of their best items on menu. Coco kiwi tasted good. Loving these healthy drinks and the concept  of coconut as base.
Ordered through zomato, good packing and smoothie was not thick, coconut milk based shake. Overall good worth for the penny spent. Will go again

Decent place to have coconut water.. priced at 50 and 85 for 300ml and 500ml respectively.. 
there are a lot of juice combinations(coconut water + some other fruit) to try here and the staff was friendly enough to kick-start conversations.. üòÑüòÑ
Good restaurant with multiple varieties of coconut drinks,no option for dine in(sitting) only take away option or stand and have. Taste is awesome
not so good, not so bad
I ordered for coco pomegranate but I got coconut juice
Please improve. You were much better before

explicitly asked for no sugar :/

Very good quality of juice at reasonable price. One should have coco-dates juice or coco-watermelon which are my favourite.
Regards
Mohammad

Juice made with fresh coconut water which helps re-energize. Very good staff and they serve very quick.
Definitely try Watermelon.....
All the best

One of the must try outlets when you are at DLF. Finally glad to see a juice bar that is healthy fresh and all natural.Love the service these guys provide. The range of the juices they have is worth mentioning. All the juices are coconut milk or coconut water based and trust me I was surprised more than once with the taste it gives especially the the juice with dates and coconut water.

Superb intervention, I go there everyday, juices are awesome.. I would definitely give more stars if possible. It is a natural drink and everyone should definitely try it. Moreover it is not costly and very affordable. For sure u will love i ‚úå
Very fantastic Juice bar...Which serves all varieties of juices ...The flavours are very Good...It is located at the DLF BUILDING ...Do visit this place

It was a pleasant to see a healthy juice corner in DLF.I like the concept that all the drinks were based on coconut water,tender coconut Malai,coconut milk and fresh fruits completely natural....I have tried COCONUT JUICE AND COCONUT DATES both tasted very refreshing and did not overpower the coconut taste...
overall the service is very good and this place is definitely worth....
No coconut lemon or honey. Disappointed
Heavily diluted

Ordered coconut mint cooler from this restaurant and it was good and reached my expectations. So, I ordered another flavour coconut malai via pickup  just to see how this place was and its ambience.
It was good and it is only for delivery and no seats available. Overall the taste was good

I have tried their 4 items. Out of 4, one turned out to be good which is dates smoothy. Idea behind the menu is different however smoothy and shakes need to be milk based, it can not be coconut water based

This juice bar is located just near DLF gate 1. The offerings are extensive considering the fact that everything has either coconut water, malai or coconut milk. I usually order the coconut juice(500ml) which come in variations of 100ml/500ml and a litre if you are visiting the place physically. The juice is basically tender coconut water which is blended with coconut malai. It tastes great and is very much refreshing. Overall the service is good and this place is definitely worth the money you spend.

Super coconut juice, pomogranate is also awesome Which mixed with coconut water , they have to expand as soon as possible to every area.
Thank you for the out put
This is the best place to drink healthy juices. There coconut juice & coconut date are really super must try place to every hyderabadi . We know Health is wealth, i think we can buy health here

They used to be the best. But recently when I ordered the dates coco dates smoothie, they delivered coco dates water with a tinge of rose water for some reaaon! Another one goes down the drain after a rockstar beginning!
He's really good. I liked his politeness
very goog
best in finding location....

It was a pleasant surprise to see a healthy drink corner in DLF. I really like the concept that all the drinks were coconut milk,water or malai based , completely natural without any added sweetener.¬†
I have tried the Coco mint cooler and coco kiwi mocktail, both tasted very refreshing and did not overpower the coconut water flavor.
The price may seem a little on the higher side but considering the ingredients used its worth a try .
they are not mainting the quality. earlier it was very pure and good to taste. but now its diluted. the quality is reducing day by day,they have to look into this

Writing this after tasting the juice for morethan 20 times.
They failed to maintain the same quality. Its decreasing day by day . Not so pure now.

quality is reducing day by day. I think pure coconut juice is not used. included lot of coconut milk

I visit this place especially after mid nights. The place is open till 4.00 am in the morning. So the best one to order is the coconut juice which is mixed with Malai. Even tried their coconut dates shake. So if you are looking for a healthy drink may be you can try your coconut juice bar.

Really horrible. Mango drink was tasteless and a little sour. Felt stale. The Chikoo drink was very coarse and horrible on the palate.

juice was really average.nothing special as described in the description. and the juice doesn't taste like coconut water being mixed in it. hence would say it's a disappointment.

As the names says, tried their coconut juice which was good and refreshing. Also tried the mango and kiwi shakes. They use coconut milk in that as well. Was good but they aren't consistent with the quality they had.
order was delivered at 11.pm which was too late

Perfect location to have coconut juice, since it is surrounded by many other eateries, will serve as thirst buster. Nicely blending coconut water and other complementary fruits, dates, etc is their uniqueness.
not matching with ordered name..not at all red
In love with this juice i am so addicted to it feels like drinking it everyday hospitality is too good and this boys are doing wonders and delivering quality and pure coconut juice

Every juice has a blend of coconut water in it... tried coconut date ... wud rate it as 3/5 average ...coconut water lovers may like different variants of juices with base of coconut water.
